text_block_list.text: ――Breaking away from the pack is an adventure.

Cutting through the air, not looking over your shoulder. 
Yet, you feel the immense pressure from behind radiate over you.

Relaxing is not an option, lest those behind will catch up. 
On the other hand, speeding up drains your stamina.

With fear comes risk... A gamble where the odds 
are against you. The only option for success is 
going all in! Hang on, now...

Controlling the pace and the direction of the race. The ruler 
of the race. That's what it means to use the runner strategy.

Hmm? So that's your training plan for leaders? Pretty 
detailed for a beginner. Even planning out the second leg.
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
You even included some G1s, not bad! And you want to 
take a record during... An overseas expedition...?
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
choice_data_list: Yes, that's part of the plan!

text_block_list.text:
Hah ha ha! You're full of surprises eh, newbie? Overcoming 
everything, as long as you have motivation? Come, now.
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
I think you should get your head out of the clouds. 
You should act a bit more seriously. You're an adult. 
What you're going for is like a child's dream.
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
After taking notes on what she told me, I headed outside. 
I came across some kids near the river. I guess school ended.
I'm gonna be a pro baseballer!
text_block_list.name: Boy with a backpack

text_block_list.text:
Well, I'm gonna be a pop idol! 
I want to be sparkling just like them!
text_block_list.name: Girl with a backpack

text_block_list.text: ――And I, I'm gonna build a castle!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl

text_block_list.text: You think my childlike dream is to laugh at, too?
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl

text_block_list.text: Hahaha! A castle? That's impossible!
text_block_list.name: Boy with a backpack

text_block_list.text: What? Look kid, nothing is impossible for me, the great adventure hunter: Tap Dance City!
text_block_list.name: Umamusume

text_block_list.text: You'd better believe I'm not building any old castle! It's gonna be gigantic! Big enough for me and my mates to dance from night till the sun comes up!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Party all night, every night until we collapse! 
A place where you'll be greeted by sonorous singing!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Of course, I'll need money! I'll race and race and race 
my butt off and make enough to fulfil my dream!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: Aaand... next! It's your turn now! You there! What is your dream?
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: Huh? For laughing at those kids' dreams, I expected you to have one far greater than them.
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Don't think I didn't catch you acting like those 
kids' dreams were like jokes to you.
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
――I froze up completely, with my notebook 
clenched to my chest.

Given your lack of experience, let me tell you a bit about 
the world of horse racing. Reaching the Open class 
is a lot tougher than you might realize.
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Don't you think your goals are a bit of a stretch? 
Not only mastering the G1 class, but even a record 
and going overseas, too...?
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
My seniors tell me my dreams are unrealistic. It's laughable 
for an adult like me to even say it out loud...

... Tell me anyway! 
I really, really, really wanna know!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Don't be so shy! An epic tale is something 
to be shared, am I wrong?
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: You can't even tell me? ――Is it that pathetic?
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
My sudden outburst shocked even myself. Although... 
I'm starting to feel a wave of regret sweep over me.
choice_data_list: <size=42>(Why didn't I say anything back then...)</size>
<size=42>(Why didn't I say anything back then...)</size>

text_block_list.text:
Reaching the Open class is a lot tougher 
than you might realize.
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Don't you think your goals are a bit of a stretch? 
Not only mastering the G1 class, but even a record 
and going overseas, too...?
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
choice_data_list: (Yes, but I still want to try!)

text_block_list.text: The more I think back, the more pathetic and frustrated I feel... It's my dream, and yet... I couldn't say anything to her.
...You treasure that dream of yours?
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
...My frustration reached its breaking point. 
I close my eyes and take a deep breath.
choice_data_list: <size=36>I want to train the world's greatest horsegirl!</size>
<size=36>I want to train the world's greatest horsegirl!</size>

text_block_list.text: ...Really?
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: Ha ha ha! Well...
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: It's wonderful!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Today is a "Selection Race." Trainers gather at the racecourse 
and look for a horsegirl to be scouted. And there...

It's showtime! 
My selection race has finally arrived!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
...Are you sure about using up your energy before the race 
even begins? It's medium-length. You'll need the stamina.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
Shakur! Coolheaded and giving advice as always. 
You're a lovely classmate!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: ...Shaddup.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: Haha! How unfriendly! ...Hmm?
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
I remember you! 
You're that "world's greatest" guy!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: Naturally. I would never forget you! ...Ah! I see, you're here to watch me race with your own eyes!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
You wanna see if I'm fit to be 
"the world's greatest horsegirl."
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: ――And thus began Tap Dance City's selection race.
